H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H7673.def: = process by which an activity comes to an end

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2154.def: = a project or scheme as conceived in the heart or mind, which can be either bad or good

H2184.def: = action by which humans engage in non-sanctioned worship, ◄ described in terms of prostitution

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H3069.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H8130.def: = state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H5361.def: = process by which humans or deities develop a strong aversion against (other) humans, often as a result of their behavior

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3018.def: = action by which humans are engaged in laborious work which requires a lot of energy and ultimately results in exhaustion

H5800.def: = action by which humans or deities move away from an object, person, or place

H5903.def: = state in which humans are fully unclothed

H2183.def: = action by which humans engage in prostitution; ≈ associated with unfaithfulness

H1540.def: = action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do

H2154.def: = a project or scheme as conceived in the heart or mind, which can be either bad or good

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H2930.def: = process by which humans, or objects are or become contaminated, ◄ as a result of contagious diseases or conditions, unlawful activities, or contact with what has been contaminated, ► which often results in their inability of being used or participating in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures

H1544.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ usually made from stone or wood overlaid with gold or silver; ► functioning as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H269.def: = daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H3563.def: = small, bowl-shaped container ► used for drinking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote one's portion in life, received from God

H7342.def: = state in which an object is large in size

H6712.def: = action by which humans make the sounds and movements that express either amusement or derision

H3933.def: only used in poetry; = action by which humans express their disdain of others with words, sounds and/or gestures

H3557.def: = state in which a container is able to accomodate something within its available space

H4767.def: = state in which objects are many in quantity

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H7943.def: = state of being intoxicated ◄ as a result of having drunk too much wine; ≈ associated with large quantities

H8047.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H8111.def: = town; ◄ constructed by king {L:Omri<SDBH:עָמְרִי>}; ► capital of northern {L:Israelite<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} kingdom until it was conquered by {L:Assyrians<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}; ≈ often used metonymically to refer to the entire northern kingdom

H1633.def: = causative action by which humans or animals chew on an object persistently in an effort to satisfy their hunger or thirst

H2789.def: = container ◄ made of baked clay; ► used for household activities, in sacrificial rituals, and for the storage of documents; ≈ regarded as of low value

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H7364.def: = causative action by which humans or animals wash (part of) their own body or someone else's body or another object, usually with water, ► in order to remove any dirt; ≈ the resulting cleanness often symbolizes ritual cleanness, innocence, or even holiness

H3583.def: = causative action by which humans, especially women, apply cosmetics to the face ► for beauty purposes

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H4296.def: = a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70-80 centimeters wide; ► used by people of means to sit or sleep on

H3520.def: = state in which an object inspires awe because of its beauty and luxury

H7979.def: literally: something that has been spread out; hence: = a flat surface on which food has been spread out for eating ◄ usually made of wood but can be a piece of animal skin or leather ► used in private and public occasions, and frequently for sacred uses in the tabernacle and temple

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H7004.def: = smoke ◄ produced by burning sacrifice or incense ► in order to please God with its smell

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

H7961.def: = state in which humans can live without fear or concerns, which is either or not appropriate depending on the situation

H1995.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, sometimes associated with natural phenomena like heavy rain and the waves of a stormy sea

H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H5850.def: = circular or semi-circular ornamental headdress, ◄ usually made out of precious metals and decorated with jewels, ► worn by kings, priests, and officials as a symbol of authority and status; also given to women by their suitors to win their affection

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H1087.def: = state in which objects have lost their quality and strength due to continued use; ≈ used figuratively to denote the loss of a person's vitality

H7275.def: literally: to stone (with stones); hence: = causative action by which humans throw rocks at other humans until they die

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H784.def: = state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
